name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_earnings_data
description: Earnings_Data Company's financial report data, such as earnings report date, earnings call transcript, profit, revenue, eps, etc.

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_news_search
description: News_Search Search news by keywords or query

properties.description: Search target query or keywords, multiple terms can be separated by spaces

query.description: Search target query or keywords, multiple terms can be separated by spaces

time.description: Certain date or date range you want to search (e.g., 2024-10-01, 2024-10-10~2024-10-20)

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_options_chain
description: Options_Chain Search for options chain of target stock with certain date range.

properties.description: The direction of Options(e.g. CALL, PUT))

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

time.description: Use to get quote chain in certain date or date range, return in format yyyy-mm-dd. For a date range, return in format yyyy-mm-dd~yyyy-mm-dd. For Multiple date ranges are returned in the format yyyy-mm-dd~yyyy-mm-dd, yyyy-mm-dd~yyyy-mm-dd. return the latest two weeks data if time is empty.

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_options_data
description: Options_Data Search for options relevant options data like iv, iv relevant data (e.g. ivhvratio, ivpercentile), call/put ratio and options bulk order.

properties.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_stock_quote
description: Stock_Quote This function fetches the latest stock market data for a given stock symbol, output the stock's basic quote(e.g. stock price, pct, trading volume, etc), analysis data(e.g. short data, capital flow, forward pe distribution, etc) and company's profile(e.g. executive officers, directors info, etc)

properties.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_stock_quote_history
description: Stock_Quote_History Search for stock and index quote information of a historical day, including basic stock quote (open price, close price, low price, high price, quote change rate and turnover).

properties.description: Certain date or date range you want to search (e.g., 2024-10-01, 2024-10-10~2024-10-20)

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

time.description: Certain date or date range you want to search (e.g., 2024-10-01, 2024-10-10~2024-10-20)

name: @community-service_mcplink_老虎股票数据2504_post_stock_quote_intraday
description: Stock_Quote_Intraday Displays the K-line per minute for a single stock on a single day

properties.description: Certain date you want to search (e.g., 2024-10-01)

stock.description: stock symbol (e.g., 00700, AAPL, NVDA), split by comma for multi companies

time.description: Certain date you want to search (e.g., 2024-10-01)
